title: Cratoon
author: Cratoon
content: Hey BitcoinTalk Community! Take part in the great Regatta wagering contest at Paradice crypto casino with 1 BTCTC prize fund.Start — 17th June 2022, 7:00 UTC.Finish — 24th June 2022, 7:00 UTC.How to win?1. Sign up or sign inNew players are welcome to get a 100 PRDC bonus to train your gambling skills at Paradice.2. Play your favorite games3. Climb to the top of the leaderboardThe more you wager, the higher you are on the leaderboard of the competition. The top 10 players will get their reward, 1 BTCTC total.

comments.author: aew
comments.body: Checked the website 3 things turned me off1 the website so slow in mobile the crash is actually limbo not crash And the auto bet so slow even with speed like if there things in background going on. Ofcourse exept dice2 the race terms Quote"3. BEFORE WITHDRAWING THE WON FUNDS, IT IS NECESSARY TO MAKE A SERIES OF BETS FOR TOTAL WINNINGS WITH CHANCE OF NO MORE THAN 49%."Weird term but it's your casino so you free to put whatever term3 the race that you all regatta you gave a lot of accusations in the past of fake results fake players and so on u hope this one is different without fake players with demo money. Work in the reputation first.
